original_title: Njinga The Queen King; The Return Of A Warrior
overview: Njinga ruled 17th century Ndongo - now Angola - as 'king' because tribal custom forbade her to rule as a woman. Flowing freely between time periods, the play traces the diaspora of Njinga's people to Brazil and the United States. Oliveros' score along with the use of electronics and spatialization, provides an environment for the traditional African music, heightening the drama
title: Njinga The Queen King; The Return Of A Warrior
